fields.name: id
fields.description: NLA identifier for the page image containing the cartoon

fields.name: page
fields.description: number of the page containing the cartoon

fields.name: url
fields.description: url to open the page in Trove's digitised object viewer

fields.name: download_image
fields.description: url to download a high-resolution page image

fields.name: text
fields.description: OCRd text extracted from the page
